qr.qr_login_description: You can log in by recognizing the QR code from Smart Glasses
qr.qr_login_how_to_description_1: 1. Run the VIRNECT Remote App on the smart glasses to be used.
qr.qr_login_how_to_description_2: 2. Select [QR Login] on the login screen to run it.
qr.qr_login_how_to_description_3: 3. Please display the QR code on the current screen. The instrument logs in when the QR code is recognized.
qr.qr_login_how_to_description_4: *Only for devices that support QR code
